projects.title: Water Pollution Game
projects.content: A JavaScript app I developed to help raise awareness for charity: Water by implementing my geography knowledge. Explore the THREE.js interactive globe and discover hotspots to learn more information.

projects.title: Digital Card Binder
projects.content: A Kotlin Android app that allows users to digitally display their collection of trading cards. Users can add cards by taking pictures or searching a database, organize them into binders, and share their collections with friends.

projects.title: Degree Works App
projects.content: Redesigning our schools web application 'Degree Works'; Designed to help students track their academic progress and plan their course schedules effectively.

projects.title: Traffic Simulation
projects.content: A locally run traffic simulation tool built with Python and PyGame. Developed to create and manage traffic scenarios, visualize traffic flow, and analyze the impact of different variables on traffic patterns.
